Name: Halloween SEX Party [18+]
About the game: [h1]An exciting 18+ horror sex adventure awaits you![/h1] Halloween SEX Party [18+] is a casual game with original puzzle mechanics based on runners. To experience the whole journey with our sexy girls you have to win a variety of levels by finding the escape of levels. Instead of controlling the character outright, you have to interact with the environment to move through the levels. Unlock the doors, avoid traps, and destroy your enemies before they do you damage. [h1]Game Features:[/h1] 10 sex scenes with Live2D animations! You will be able to interact with every girl. Unique puzzle mechanic based on runners Dive deep into our Halloween girls' personalities & go through the story together with them. Experience the Halloween Horror theme and reveal the truth alongside our main Heroines! [h1] All characters are over 18 years old [/h1]
